definitions.example: When the motor stopped, the silence was almost deafening.

definitions.definition: The act of refraining from speaking.
definitions.example: "You have the right to silence," said the police officer.

definitions.definition: Form of meditative worship practiced by the Society of Friends (Quakers); meeting for worship.
definitions.example: During silence a message came to me that there was that of God in every person.
Can you silence the crowd, so we can start the show?

definitions.definition: To repress the expression of something.
definitions.example: Women, as well as children, have their thoughts or emotions routinely silenced.
